content.raw:
Hi folks,
I wanna play Mario AI game in Gazebo. On the Internet, i didn't find any usefull information to do that. But in my opinion the following steps are nessesary:

1. Import a real 3D environment in gazebo via "reconstruction of slam-data"
2. calculating all possible paths of the robot from actual location to goal
3. execute this goal

This idea is similar to what Emo Todorov has done, see his videos on his Website (moving a robot from current position to a home position).
content.html:
Hi folks, I wanna play Mario AI game in Gazebo. On the Internet, i didn't find any usefull information to do that. But in my opinion the following steps are nessesary:

  1. Import a real 3D environment in gazebo via "reconstruction of slam-data"
  2. calculating all possible paths of the robot from actual location to goal
  3. execute this goal

This idea is similar to what Emo Todorov has done, see his videos on his Website (moving a robot from current position to a home position).
